#include "meetup.h"

namespace meetup {

namespace {

int get_wday(int year, int month, int day) {
    std::tm time_in = { 0, 0, 0, day, month - 1, year - 1900 };
    std::mktime(&time_in);
    return time_in.tm_wday;
}

std::tm find_date(int year, int month, const std::string& which, int target_wday) {
    std::tm result = {0};
    
    if (which == "teenth") {
        for (int day = 13; day <= 19; day++) {
            if (get_wday(year, month, day) == target_wday) {
                result.tm_mday = day;
                result.tm_mon = month - 1;
                result.tm_year = year - 1900;
                return result;
            }
        }
    } else if (which == "first") {
        for (int day = 1; day <= 7; day++) {
            if (get_wday(year, month, day) == target_wday) {
                result.tm_mday = day;
                result.tm_mon = month - 1;
                result.tm_year = year - 1900;

                return result;
            }
        }
    } else if (which == "third") {
        for (int day = 15; day <= 21; day++) {
            if (get_wday(year, month, day) == target_wday) {

                result.tm_mon = month - 1;

                result.tm_mon = month - 1;
                result.tm_year = year - 1900;
                return result;
            }
        }

        // Find the last day of the month
        std::tm time_in = {0};
